Description:                               =

Uncover the mystery of the Night Stalker in The Torment of Whitewall! A shadowy figure has been stalking the streets of Whitewall, and young women have been disappearing without trace. Only one girl has managed to escape from the mysterious attacker, but sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not talking to anyoneÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ Rumor has it that something strange and terrible happened to her that night. Rumor has it that this so-called Night Stalker is some kind of monster. As more and more people are driven from their homes by fear, you are called in to end the townÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s terrible torment.
